name: Chicken Paprikash
keywords: chicken, scallion, sweet paprika, gluten-free, nut-free, main course
recipeIngredient: 6 leg-thigh pieces of chicken, skinned and cut apart

recipeInstructions.text: Put chicken, scallions, salt, garlic, dill weed, chicken stock and wine into a pot, bring to a boil, cover and simmer over low heat for 20 to 25 minutes. Remove chicken pieces to a warm place.

Boil the liquid in the pot until it is slightly reduced. Stir in paprika and tomato sauce and mix well. Add sour cream and heat to just below boiling. Return chicken pieces to the pot to reheat, but do not allow to boil. Serve with buttered noodles.
